name: Meteora-app
title: METEORA
description: This app is built on Socket.io library and supposed to be a Telegram killer. While using this app you should experience an incredible trip to distant planets.

name: Retro-game-app
title: RETRO GAME COLLECTION
description: App is focused on helping retro game geeks to find new lots on ebay and maintain their collection. Pure nostalgia included.
